title: Do deep discharge lead acid batteries allow 100% discharge? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, in a sense, because 100% is relative, not finite. But, anymore than 60% nominal discharge, and most likely the battery will never charge again to the original rated capacity. It also depends on the battery physical construction and/or type, as to how much cycle stress it can tolerate. Also, there is a difference between typical deep cycle and industrial deep cycle batteries. Look to google in regards, because it is beyond the scope of this forum/question.
